name: Messy Cities
description:
[Game made during a Game Jam]

Messy Cities is a strategy game where the player must grow a civilization that pollutes the earth. Be careful not to overload the land with waste.

The player must move cities to clean up the pollution they produce. 

Cities can collect cleaning capsules, in the form of collectibles, to clean up the pollution.

The goal is to bring its population to 10 billion inhabitants.

Information about the project :

Team : 

2 Gameplay Programmers : Alexandre BACCOT, Ludovic GIOVANNETTI

2 Game Designers : Arthur MAGNAN, Malo GUYON

4 Game Artists :  Nicolas CHARLUT, Julien SOUHAITE, Léane HUPREL, Alexandre BATHANY

2 Sound Designers : Abel DIARRA, Jacopo CAFFE

Duration : 5 days
